key.name: Ctrl-d
key.desc: Fire rockets or release bombs or external tanks

key.name: Ctrl-q
key.desc: Move view closer to the HUD

key.name: F7
key.desc: Toggle level the wings and hold current V/S

key.name: F9
key.desc: Popup Fuel and Payload Settings dialog

PropertyList.line: Initial Climb Rate: 3475 feet per minute
Stall Speed (9000 lbs) Gear/Flaps Up: 102 mph
Stall Speed (9000 lbs) Gear/Flaps Down: 95 mph
PropertyList.text:
# STARTING THE ENGINE Follow the checklists to start the engine manually or choose Autostart in the menu.
# PARKING BRAKES To enable the parking brakes, pull the parking brakes lever, then depress and release the brake pedals, then push the lever back. To release the parking brakes, simply tap the brake pedals.
# TAKE OFF Follow the checklists or align with the runway and press F8 for an automatic take off.
# AUTOPILOT Press F7 to level the wings and hold the current vertical speed. A functioning Attitude Indicator and Vertical Speed Indicator are needed. On final approach or while taxiing, press F6 to hold the current heading with the rudder.
